title: substituted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 

(Section 14A) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited agriculture appeal act 2001 (section 14a) regulation 2021

title: substituted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020)
heading: 2. The period of 14 days is prescribed for the purposes of section 14A(4)(a)
text_raw:
2. The period of 14 days is prescribed for the purposes of section 14A(4)(a) 
of the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 in place of the period referred to in that 
paragraph.
text_norm: 2 period 14 day prescribed purpose section 14a(4)(a) agriculture appeal act 2001 place period referred paragraph

title: substituted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020)
heading: 3. The Forestry Appeals Committee Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 418 of
text_raw:
3. The Forestry Appeals Committee Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 418 of 
2020) are amended in Regulation 5(1) by substituting “within the period 
prescribed for the purposes of section 14A(4)(a) of the Act, such period 
beginning on the date of the decision.” for “within a period of 28 days beginning 
on the date of the decision.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 July, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 
Minister for Agriculture, Food 
and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th July, 2021.
